Body: Description: The security notice ADV-2025-010 came out last week saying to upgrade to 5.9.4.2 to resolve the issue.  We are on 5.4.9.1, and no updates have been showing up when I check for updates.  How to we upgrade to the remediated version?

What We've Learned Updated: 4/9/2025

* security notice ADV-2025-010 issued to customer stating that he should  upgrade to EPP 5.9.4.2. 

- Requested permission from customer to access backend to check status of current EPP server at 5.9.4.1. 

- Sent customer follow up to gain permission to access backend to check storage space of the EPP server
Next Steps Updated: Awaiting customer's response

What We've Learned Updated: 4/10/2025

- Customer has authorized access to the EPP Appliance backend. 

4/9/2025

* security notice ADV-2025-010 issued to customer stating that he should  upgrade to EPP 5.9.4.2. 

- Requested permission from customer to access backend to check status of current EPP server at 5.9.4.1. 

- Sent customer follow up to gain permission to access backend to check storage space of the EPP server
Next Steps Updated: - Will ask for permission to access the backend to check the status of the EPP server

What We've Learned Updated: 4/11/2025

- Access the EPP appliance backend and completed upgrade pre-checks
- No issues found from the backend

- Sent customer email requesting days and times available to schedule a remote session towards completing the upgrade to 5.9.4.2

4/10/2025

- Customer has authorized access to the EPP Appliance backend.
